titleStmt.title: A sermon of the communion of saints; preached by Edward Maie, chaplaine to the honorable societie of Lincolnes Inne
titleStmt.author: Maie, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson for George Lathum, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Brasen Serpent,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
